title: siddhivinAyakam anisham
sahitya:
siddhivinAyakam anisham cintayAmyaham prasiddha gaNanAyakam vishiSTArtha dAyakam varam


anupallavi

 siddha yakSa kinnarAdi sEvitam akhila jagat prasiddham mUla pankaja madhyastham mOdaka hastam


caraNam   bhAdra padamAsa caturtthyAm brAhmaNAdi pUjitam pAshAnkusha dharam chatra cAmara parivIjitam 
raudra bhAva rahitam dAsa jana hrdaya virAjitam rauhiNEyAnujArccitam IhanA varjitam adri rAja sutAtmajam 
ananta guruguhA grajam bhadraprada padAmbujam bhAsamAna caturbhujam
